name: Hangman (itch) (JesseWebb)
description:
With a limited amount of guesses, choose letters to reveal the hidden word. Words are chosen randomly from a pool of 300+ words.

Credits:

Programmed  by Jesse Webb minds.com/jessewebb

Written in Lua using the Love2D framework

Music: Wintersong, Adventure, & Winternight by Alexander Nakarada   www.serpentsoundstudios.com                                                                                       Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License
